content.rendered:
Dave’s Storage was looking for a very basic design layout that acted as an online brochure. They wanted the site to be based on the red, white, and blue theme.

Since they have launched their website they have had consistent traffic to their site and have been able to constantly pick up online sales through pay-per-click advertising.
